channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Bloch's conjecture on surfaces with $p_g=q=0, K^2=9$
item.description: arXiv:2508.13594v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: In this paper, we prove that Bloch's conjecture holds for all smooth, complex, projective surfaces with $p_g=q=0$ and $K^2=9$.
item.dc:creator: Kalyan Banerjee

item.title: Chow-Witt Rings of Classifying Spaces of Products of Multiplicative and Cyclic Groups
item.description: arXiv:2508.13605v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We compute the total Chow-Witt rings of the classifying space B\mu_n of the roots of unity, as well as the products BG_m x B\mu_n and B\mu_m x B\mu_n for all m,n greater than or equal to 1 based on the strategy by di Lorenzo and Mantovani (2023) for B\mu_n with n even. Moreover we compute the total I^j-cohomology and Chow-Witt rings of P^q x P^r for all q,r greater than or equal to 1 and of BG_m x BG_m.
item.dc:creator: Andrea Lachmann
